name: HalloweeNight
description: A college party is the stage for bloodshed and murder on Halloween Night, as a mistreated student exacts his revenge on those who wronged him. Using the effigy of a living scarecrow, his Frankenstein like creation carries out his ...
keywords: killer scarecrow, slasher, supernatural serial killer, scarecrow, halloween

review.author: kaplanwizardry
review.heading: Amazing story made with passion!
review.reviewBody: This movie was amazing though the so called collage students were like 35 and married who cares this film has inspired me to do some filmaking as well and i could tell that the director aka ( Mark Polonia) putted a lot of effort into this to honor his brother and the effects and cgi at the end was great using stop motion\n\nA+
